meanings.definition: A device used to remove moisture from food.
meanings.sent1: My mom bought a new dehydrator to make dried fruit snacks.
meanings.sent2: The dehydrators at the store were on sale for a limited time.
meanings.sent3: The dehydrator decided to take a vacation and left all the fruits soggy.
meanings.sent4: The dehydrator worked tirelessly, sucking out the water from the fruits like a thirsty sponge.
meanings.sent5: The dehydrator hummed softly as it transformed juicy fruits into shriveled snacks.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that dehydrates.
meanings.sent1: The sun is a natural dehydrator, drying up puddles after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The dehydrators in the kitchen were busy preparing ingredients for the chef.
meanings.sent3: The dehydrator squirrel made sure all the nuts were dry before storing them.
meanings.sent4: Time can be a dehydrator, slowly draining the energy from lively plants.
meanings.sent5: The wind acted as a dehydrator, turning the once lush grass into a dry field.
